files.description: Fix and provide a runnable CLI entry module for qg_bench with corrected syntax and minimal, robust argument parsing.
Fix and provide a valid markdown utility module with corrected syntax and stable public helpers used by the package.
Regression tests that import the previously failing modules to ensure no SyntaxError or import-time crashes occur.
Minimal CLI smoke test that executes the qg_bench CLI help/version path to confirm end-to-end invocation works without errors.

missionDescription: Fix blocking syntax errors preventing execution in the already-created deliverables: `qg_bench/cli.py` (reported syntax_error), `src/cosmo_contracts/markdown.py` (reported syntax_error), and any additional syntax errors encountered during the urgent end-to-end run; add/adjust minimal tests to prevent regression.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
Multiple specialist agents explicitly reported syntax_error in key entry points; until these are repaired, the benchmark runner and tests cannot execute, blocking closure of the implementation loop.
